item.title: Probabilistic Decomposed Linear Dynamical Systems for Robust Discovery of Latent Neural Dynamics
item.description: Probabilistic Decomposed Linear Dynamical Systems (p-dLDS) improve latent variable inference in nonlinear neural systems by using a probabilistic approach that’s robust to noise and includes a time-va…
